DOC.brief_title: A Study Pharmacokinetics Safety Varespladib Subjects With Normal Impaired Renal Function
DOC.criteria: Males nonpregnant , nonlactating female 18 year old BMI 1840 kg/m2 inclusive . Regarding renal function , subject classify either normal suffering mild , moderate severe renal impairment .
